tool_description:
Free stock API with real time data. No need for API keys or signup. Read more on https://algobook.info/docs/stock-api-docs

Explore all our free APIs: https://algobook.info/apis
name: Algobook stock API
title: Algobook stock API

api_list.name: Get stock data for tickers
api_list.description: Endpoint for getting stock information for a specific ticker. If more than one is needed, provide a comma separated list in the query param.
